bio: Member of India's Davis Cup team for over 13 years. Quarterfinalist at
1955, 59, 65, 67 Wimbledon doubles. Ranked in Top Ten, 1959-62.
Semifinalist at 1960, 61 Wimbledon, Quarterfinalist at 1962 French Open.
Father of Ramesh Krishnan who is currently ranked in the top 50 on the
